subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2714 is on the way
description_text:
Hello,

Where is my order and what is going? I thought it was getting delivered
last week.


Regards,

Omar Moreno Medrano
Quality Control Manager
NACE CIP LVL III #33959
AMPP Senior Certified Coating Inspector N-33959
Coating Industries Inc.
Office: 713-937-8581
Cell:    832-980-8648
omar@coatingindustries.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Omar Moreno,    We apologize for the delay. We are currently on an 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped from our U.S. warehouse. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
